mapper.select: SELECT doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_title, doc_content, doc_retention_period, doc_write_date, doc_report_date, doc_complete_date, doc_state, doc_read_yn, doc_temp_yn, doc_aprv_step, doc_max_step FROM documents WHERE doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents ( doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_title, doc_content, doc_retention_period, doc_write_date, doc_report_date, doc_complete_date, doc_state, doc_read_yn, doc_temp_yn, doc_aprv_step, doc_max_step ) VALUES ( #{docId}, #{empId}, #{docType}, #{docTitle}, #{docContent}, #{docRetentionPeriod}, #{docWriteDate}, #{docReportDate}, #{docCompleteDate}, #{docState}, #{docReadYn}, #{docTempYn}, #{docAprvStep}, #{docMaxStep} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM documents WHERE doc_id = #{docId} AND (doc_temp_yn = 'Y' OR doc_state = '회수')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents ( doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_title, doc_content, doc_retention_period, doc_write_date, doc_temp_yn ) VALUES ( #{docId}, #{empId}, #{docType}, #{docTitle}, #{docContent}, #{docRetentionPeriod}, #{docWriteDate}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM documents WHERE emp_id = #{empId} and doc_temp_yn = 'N' AND doc_state != '승인'

SELECT doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_title, doc_report_date, doc_complete_date, doc_state, doc_read_yn FROM ( SELECT rnum, doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_title, doc_report_date, doc_complete_date, doc_state, doc_read_yn FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, doc_id, emp_id, doc_type, doc_title, doc_report_date, doc_complete_date, doc_state, doc_read_yn FROM documents WHERE emp_id = #{empId} and doc_temp_yn = 'N' AND doc_state != '완결' ORDER BY doc_report_date DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pager.rowsPerPage} * #{pager.pageNo} ) WHERE rnum > (#{pager.rowsPerPage} * (#{pager.pageNo} - 1))
